content: fur glove cuffs skill level easy size to fit standard pair of women s gloves materials 1 pair commercially-knit or fabric gloves 1 ball novelty eyelash-yarn approx 60 yds sample shown in austermann casca few yds sport-weight yarn to match glove size d/3 3 25 mm and h/8 5 mm crochet hooks tapestry needle sewing needle & thread for fabric fleece or suede glove cuff gauge not important for this project terms/abbreviations beginning beg chain chain each ea hook hk repeat repeat round round single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch stitch st 1 cuff for a machine-knitted glove foundation round with smaller hook and sport-weight yarn poke crochet hook through top edge of glove cuff approx 1/4 from edge and complete a single_crochet repeat evenly around cuff sample worked on 30 single_crochet join with slip_stitch and fasten_off round 1 change to larger hook and eyelash yarn chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join with slip stitch do not turn round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch repeat last round for 2-1/2 or desired length when folded over fasten_off weave in ends fold cuff over top of glove cuff for a fabric glove this cuff is worked separately then attached to a fabric fleece or suede glove where it would be difficult to insert a small crochet hook to make the foundation round round 1 with larger hook and eyelash yarn chain 31 and join into ring round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in ea chain around join with slip_stitch do not turn round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around do not turn repeat last round until cuff measures 2-1/2 or desired length when folded over cut eyelash yarn leaving 5 end for weaving in change to smaller hook and join sport-weight yarn round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch do not turn repeat last round 3 times join with slip_stitch and fasten_off weave in ends finishing with sewing needle and
